alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luna County through 500 PM MDT... At 432 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Akela, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunshine, Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
